alert.note: Alert for Genesee; Monroe; Northern Erie (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 9:13AM EST until January 25 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches. Light snow will continue through midday. Snow will increase this afternoon with snowfall rates over 1 inch per hour between 1 and 5 pm. The heaviest snow will occur from the Buffalo Northtowns along and north of the Thruway toward Rochester. Snow will change to light rain this evening. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph this evening. * WHERE...Monroe, Northern Erie, and Genesee counties. * WHEN...Until 10 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute.
info.instruction: Widespread accumulating snow will create dangerous travel conditions. Submit snow reports through our website or social media.
